item.description:
My favorite band, Toad the Wet Sprocket, is coming to town, and I'd like to personally invite everyone in the Providence Collective to join me for the show.  

We'll meet at the Monday Night Meetup at Local 121 before the show, and then walk over as a group.  Here are the details:

 

Who: Toad the Wet Sprocket

Where: Lupo's Heartbreak Hotel

When: Monday, August 8th  Doors at 7pm, show at 8pm.

Tickets: GA tickets are $25 in advance, $30 day of show

 

If you're looking at tickets online, I purchased a "Downstairs" "GA Floor" ticket.

http://themetri.com/events/toad-the-wet-sprocket/

When buying tickets online, there is a $5.95 fee, so it will be $30.95 total.  I'm not sure if the show is going to sell out, but I've already purchased my ticket, just in case.

 

After breaking up in 1998, recently the four original (and only) band members have reunited, begun touring, and will release a new album in the near future.

If you don't remember their music, check out the following links to have a listen:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YZpUUrEWnWQ

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gcHB060NKYo

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yp1ZGW9MdbI

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_k6r4yG6NIM

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqZ4FZHEZAI

 

Hope to see you there!

Stephanie
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting at Local 121 with the rest of the Monday Night Meetup (1 block west) before the show.
item.name: Toad the Wet Sprocket concert at Lupo's Heartbreak Hotel
